item.title: New version
item.description:
Version 1.0.0.15
  • Added support for CSRF token.
  • Switched to small PNG images of avatars (since program has no JPEG 2000 support yet).
Version 1.0.0.14
  • Updated Second Life login algorithm.
  • Increased avatar image size.
  • Block menu or caption button exit.
Version 1.0.0.13
  • Setup fixed.
Version 1.0.0.12
  • GUI bugfixes.
Version 1.0.0.11
  • Added translation support.
  • Added Russian translation.
Version 1.0.0.10
  • Improved online timeline.
Version 1.0.0.9
  • Added online timeline.
  • Added Ctrl+A (select all) and Esc (deselect all) hotkeys.
  • Improved miltiple avatar operations.
Version 1.0.0.8
  • Improved avatar filter edit box.
Version 1.0.0.7
  • Added avatar filter.
Version 1.0.0.6
  • Added "-tray" command-line option to minimize application at Windows startup.
  • Added window snapping to the screen edges by holding Shift key.
  • Project updated up to Visual C++ 2015.
  • Reduced setup size by excluding C++ redistributables.
Version 1.0.0.5
  • Fixed "Show online avatars only" option.
  • Added tray menu.
  • Setup built by InnoSetup 5.5.6.
Version 1.0.0.4
  • Added more options.
  • Added application auto-start after upgrade.
  • Improved debugging log.
  • Improved setup.
  • Minor optimizations.
Version 1.0.0.3
  • Added auto-restoring after login errors.
Version 1.0.0.2
  • Added start at Windows startup option.
  • Added avatar list context menu.
  • Minor bugfixes.
Version 1.0.0.1
  • Fixed case of display names.
  • Improved image cache.
  • Added online/offline delay time (5 minutes).
Version 1.0.0.0
  • Initial release.
